content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Enumerate company employees. Using known email domains, search for employee email addresses using the RainKing. This process is currently manual. Purchase a license for RainKing or make a request to the sales to obtain a list of email addresses for the target company.

Variation: Manual


1. Visit the URL below and perform searches.
https://app.rainkingonline.com/login/auth

Report Verification


Please add this finding to the workspace and add the discovered email addresses as a verification item.
